Class PersistentMemory_Disabled

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.mroland.objectstaterecovery.PersistentMemory

  • public class PersistentMemory_Disabled
extends PersistentMemory
    Basic implementation of storage persistent memory of JCRE

    • Method Detail

      • addProhibitedReference

        public void addProhibitedReference(Object object)
        Register an object instance that must never be included in persistent memory. References to such objects will be replaced with null references during state collection.
        Overrides:
        addProhibitedReference in class PersistentMemory
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be excluded.

      • addProhibitedClass

        public void addProhibitedClass(Class classObject)
        Register class that must never be included in persistent memory. Requests to record the state of these classes' static members will be ignored.
        Overrides:
        addProhibitedClass in class PersistentMemory
        Parameters:
        classObject - Class to be excluded.

      • addProhibitedClass

        public void addProhibitedClass(String className)
        Register class that must never be included in persistent memory. Requests to record the state of these classes' static members will be ignored.
        Overrides:
        addProhibitedClass in class PersistentMemory
        Parameters:
        className - Class to be excluded (given by name).

      • updateStoredClass

        public void updateStoredClass(Class classObject,
                     boolean noDeepRefresh)
        Add or refresh a stored class. NOTE: Prohibited classes will be silently ignored.
        Overrides:
        updateStoredClass in class PersistentMemory
        Parameters:
        classObject - Class object.
        noDeepRefresh - Do not recursively refresh the state of existing objects.

      • updateStoredClass

        public void updateStoredClass(String className,
                     boolean noDeepRefresh)
        Add or refresh a stored class by name. NOTE: Prohibited classes will be silently ignored.
        Overrides:
        updateStoredClass in class PersistentMemory
        Parameters:
        className - Class name.
        noDeepRefresh - Do not recursively refresh the state of existing objects.

        public void updateStoredNamedInstance(Object object,
                             Class objectClass,
                             AID aid,
                             boolean noDeepRefresh)

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        object - Object instance.
        objectClass - Object instance class (may be null).
        aid - Object instance name as AID.
